00029 class NEDResourceCache;

00042 class NEDXML_API NEDTypeInfo
00043 {
00044   public:
00045     enum Type {SIMPLE_MODULE, COMPOUND_MODULE, MODULEINTERFACE, CHANNEL, CHANNELINTERFACE};
00046 
00047   protected:
00048     // the resolver this type is in
00049     NEDResourceCache *resolver;
00050 
00051     Type type;
00052     std::string qualifiedName;
00053     bool isInner;  // whether it is an inner type
00054     NEDElement *tree; // points into resolver
00055 
00056     // tree with inheritance flattened out.
00057     // may be NULL (-->not initialized), or ==tree (when there is no super types);
00058     // otherwise it's a constructed tree that gets disposed of in the destructor
00059     mutable NEDElement *flattenedTree;
00060 
00061     typedef std::vector<std::string> StringVector;
00062     typedef std::map<std::string,int> StringToIntMap;
00063 
00064     // inheritance. Vectors contain fully qualifies names, and include
00065     // indirect base types/interfaces as well (transitive closure).
00066     StringVector extendsnames;
00067     StringVector interfacenames;
00068 
00069     std::string enclosingTypeName;
00070 
00071     // simple module/channel C++ class to instantiate
00072     std::string implClassName;
00073 
00074   protected:
00075     NEDElement *buildFlattenedTree() const; //XXX mostly unused
00076     void mergeNEDType(NEDElement *basetree, const NEDElement *tree) const;
00077     void mergeProperties(NEDElement *basetree, const NEDElement *tree) const;
00078     void mergeProperty(PropertyElement *baseprop, const PropertyElement *prop) const;
00079     void mergePropertyKey(PropertyKeyElement *basekey, const PropertyKeyElement *key) const;
00080 
00081     void checkComplianceToInterface(NEDTypeInfo *interfaceDecl);
00082 
00083   public:
00085     NEDTypeInfo(NEDResourceCache *resolver, const char *qname, bool isInnerType, NEDElement *tree);
00086 
00088     virtual ~NEDTypeInfo();
00089 
00091     virtual const char *getName() const;
00092 
00094     virtual const char *getFullName() const;
00095 
00097     virtual NEDElement *getTree() const;
00098 
00100     virtual NEDElement *getFlattenedTree() const; //XXX this is a BAD idea, get rid of it!
00101 
00103     NEDResourceCache *getResolver() const  {return resolver;}
00104 
00109     virtual Type getType() const {return type;}
00110 
00115     virtual std::string getPackage() const;
00116 
00120     virtual std::string info() const;
00121 
00125     virtual std::string nedSource() const;
00126 
00131     virtual int numExtendsNames() const  {return extendsnames.size();}
00132 
00137     virtual const char *extendsName(int k) const;
00138 
00145     virtual int numInterfaceNames() const  {return interfacenames.size();}
00146 
00151     virtual const char *interfaceName(int k) const;
00152 
00157     virtual bool supportsInterface(const char *qname);
00158 
00162     virtual bool isInnerType() const  {return isInner;}
00163 
00168     virtual const char *getEnclosingTypeName() const;
00169 
00174     virtual bool isNetwork() const;
00175 
00180     virtual const char *implementationClassName() const;
00181 
00189     virtual std::string getPackageProperty(const char *name) const;
00190 
00192     virtual std::string getCxxNamespace() const;
00193 
00195     virtual NEDTypeInfo *getSuperDecl() const;
00196 
00199     ParametersElement *getParametersElement() const;
00200     GatesElement *getGatesElement() const;
00201     SubmodulesElement *getSubmodulesElement() const;
00202     ConnectionsElement *getConnectionsElement() const;
00203 
00205     SubmoduleElement *getLocalSubmoduleElement(const char *submoduleName) const;
